task.title: Modelling
task.description: Modelling for the game. Includes Character and Environment Modelling
task.deliverable: Zipped Folder Containing all Models and Documentation

task.title: User Interface
task.description: Design and creation of the user interface for the game. Includes the in-game HUD and front-end menus.
task.deliverable: Zipped Folder Containing all Interface files and Documentation

task.title: Development
task.description: Development of source code for the game. Includes elements of gameplay, level design, etc.
task.deliverable: Zipped folder containing all main game files

task.title: Artificial Intelligence
task.description: Artificial Intelligence
task.deliverable: Zipped folder containing algorithms and AI code

task.title: Documentation
task.description: All internal and external documentation for the game
task.deliverable: Zipped folder containing all documentation, including user manuals

task.title: Artwork
task.description: Prepare all artwork for the title
task.deliverable: Finalized artwork zip file

task.title: Textures
task.description: Completion of all textures for the game
task.deliverable: Zipped Folder Containing all textures

task.title: Platforms
task.description: Design and creation of the user interface for the game. Includes the in-game HUD and front-end menus.
task.deliverable: Zipped Folder Containing all Interface files and Documentation

task.title: Inventory
task.description: Testing for the game. Included QA and Compliance testing
task.deliverable: Completed Testing checklist with bug reports.

task.title: Production
task.description: Production of finalized game
task.deliverable: Final executable project
